text: The door creaks open, admitting you to what seems to be a shrine to one of the strange demonic gods of Krarth. A gore-drenched pelt is draped over the obsidian block of the altar. Leaping red flames crackle in iron basins on either side. A pall of grey vapour hangs in the air. Just off to one side of the altar, you see a wrough-iron gate leading to another chamber.

choices.text: Back out of here and continue up the stairs
